items.sentence: Let\'s not worry about that till it happens.
I suspect Tom won\'t tell Mary who did that.
I suspect that Tom didn\'t enjoy doing that.
I suspect that Tom isn\'t in Boston anymore.
I suspect that Tom wasn\'t really surprised.
I\'ll bet the inside of the house is a mess.
Tom told me he wanted to do that by himself.
Tom told me that I could sleep on his couch.
Tom is giving us time to consider his offer.
Tom is going to be in Boston until tomorrow.
I don\'t have a problem with Tom doing that.
I\'m not convinced that that\'s a good idea.
I\'m not sure that Tom is going to be there.
I\'m sure Tom could show you how to do that.
You should avoid that part of town at night.
You should come visit me when you have time.
Tom thinks I\'m missing a great opportunity.
You\'re not ready and I don\'t want to wait.
Tom informed Mary that he couldn\'t do that.
I\'ll be staying in Boston for three months.
